title: Did Marcel Marcio save hundreds of Jewish children from the Nazis?
subtitle: The French, now known as the world's largest pantomy artist, helped smuggle Jewish children for safety in Switzerland during the Second World War.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The world-renowned Mimi artist Marcel Marso worked with the French underground as a teenager and helped save many Jewish children from death at the hands of the Nazis during the Second World War.
